value:
$nMPID_マリアンヌ|The sea breeze and these endless
blue skies truly are a blessing from
the goddess... I'm just so grateful.

$nMPID_マリアンヌ|I'm useless, and I'm always getting
in Hilda's way... I wish I could show
her how much I appreciate her.

$nMPID_マリアンヌ|This is Askr's sea? I wonder if I'll be
able to talk to the sea creatures...

$nMPID_比翼ヒルダ|Marianne, you're so cute, but you
hide your face when you're talking
to anyone... Why?

$nMPID_比翼ヒルダ|I hate the chore of battle, but if I can
let my hair down and have a little fun
after a job, well...that's different!

$nMPID_マリアンヌ|Please excuse my dress... I've just
come from the beach with summery
tidings from $Nf.

$nMPID_比翼ヒルダ|Nice! Just like that, Marianne!
Keep it up!

$nMPID_マリアンヌ|I'm embarrassed, but...if you're here,
I'm sure it will be all right...probably.

$nMPID_マリアンヌ|I knew it... I'm just getting in your
way, Hilda. I'm so sorry.

$nMPID_比翼ヒルダ|At times like this, just smile and say
thank you, all right, Marianne?

I'm in the mood for a swim today!
What do you say, Marianne? You
can show off your cute swimsuit!

$nMPID_比翼ヒルダ|Phew! That was a lot of work—even
if it WAS fun... Let's not fight all the
time, all right, Marianne?$k$pWe should take time to relax too!$k$p$nMPID_マリアンヌ|Yes... It is not often we have such
an opportunity. It's nice to enjoy
our time when we can.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ヒルダ|Now that you've been to the beach,
why don't we invite all the Golden
Deer to come with us next time?$k$p$nMPID_マリアンヌ|W-well, I...I might still be a bit
too bashful for that...$k$p$nMPID_比翼ヒルダ|It'll be fine! You have all summer long
to work up to it—and besides that,
$Nu will be there!$k$p$nMPID_マリアンヌ|...Thank you for taking my feelings
into account, Hilda. I'll do my best
to be more...heroic this summer.
もー！
そーれっ！
(scream)
I'm going to get dirty...!
What's the big idea?
$nMPID_二人|It's over.
$nMPID_二人|Hilda... Hang in there!
$nMPID_ヒルダ|What are YOU looking at?
$nMPID_マリアンヌ|Please, just sink...
We came all this way…
$nMPID_マリアンヌ|Goddess, please...
$nMPID_マリアンヌ|I pray for your safety.
"What do you think?" "Looking good!"
"Come on, Marianne!" "Um, all right..."
You've got this!
"How immodest..." "You're fine! Don't give it a second thought."
Here we go!
Have to keep swimming...
Excuse me…
$nMPID_マリアンヌ|Oh... It's so hot out...

$nMPID_ヒルダ|No kidding! But it's all right. Just think
cool thoughts.
$nMPID_マリアンヌ|What strong sunlight… It's intense.

$nMPID_ヒルダ|Well it's not exactly easy for me,
either. But here we are.

$nMPID_マリアンヌ|Y-you're right. I suppose we should
try to enjoy ourselves.

$nMPID_ヒルダ|Hm, you seem gloomier than usual.
Oh, I know! It's because there aren't
any animals around!

$nMPID_マリアンヌ|Ahh... You might be right. But I do
love fish.
$nMPID_ヒルダ|Me too! They're delicious.

$nMPID_マリアンヌ|Oh, no, I...I meant that I love
looking at them. Such a beautiful
array of colors.$k$pAnd they have such a majestic way
of gliding through the water.

$nMPID_ヒルダ|Oh, that's what you meant! Um, sure.
There are certainly lots of fish here
that I've never seen before.

$nMPID_マリアンヌ|Right? There's such a splendid
variety of creatures flitting past
the coral...

$nMPID_マリアンヌ|It's like paradise. I can only thank the
goddess for sending me to such a
wonderful place...

$nMPID_ヒルダ|No complaints about the ocean! But
swimming sounds like a lot of work.

$nMPID_マリアンヌ|Well then, why don't we relax on
the beach? I brought a book I've
been meaning to read.
$nMPID_ヒルダ|All right. You've twisted my arm.

$nMPID_マリアンヌ|*giggles* This is nice. The two of us,
relaxing by the sea...

$nMPID_ヒルダ|Yeah! Kicking back like
nobody's business!
